EmailTemplate.name: Going to VMworld this year? (1501682055.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Going to VMworld this year? (1501682055.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Eric, Tim, Are either of you going to VMworld 2017 out in Las Vegas? My team and I are hosting a dinner at Charlie Palmer’s Steak House on Tuesday and we would love it if you could join us for some good food! Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
